response.overview: Queen’s debut album, a powerful debut from 1973, meets the soundscapes of today: Queen I Blu-ray Audio presents this milestone in a comprehensively reworked form. The original, recorded in 1972 and quickly certified gold in the UK and US with classics such as “Keep Yourself Alive” and “Liar,” forms the basis for a sound experience that has been redefined by modern audio technology.
response.title: Queen - Queen I (Blu-ray Audio)
